Plymouth.Center of the American Experiment:
The Center of the American Experiment is a Minnesota-based think tank that advocates for conservative and free-market principles.


== Overview ==
The Center of the American Experiment was founded in 1990 by Mitch Pearlstein, a former Reagan appointee. Annette Meeks previously served as the organization's CEO. It has received grants from the Bradley Foundation and the John M. Olin Foundation.
